replies.txt_content: 抗性提示1和保护4，请问保护4是护甲还是什么？

replies.author: E100撞老鼠
replies.txt_content:
版本是什么....1.8和1.7指令不一样的....
这是1.8的指令,全身保护4钻石套加抗性提升
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{id:minecraft:diamond_boots,Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:4}},{id:minecraft:diamond_leggings,Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:4}},{id:minecraft:diamond_chestplate,Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:4}},{id:minecraft:diamond_helmet,Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:4}}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:11,Amplifier:1,Duration:1000000}]}复制代码
